00039 
00040 static const TraceClass TRACE_CLI("CLI", "CLI traces");
00041 
00042 static CliList M_CLIList;
00043 
00044 Cli::Cli(const std::string& STR_Name, const Help& CLI_Help)
00045   : Menu(STR_Name, CLI_Help),
00046     m_pcliShell(NULL),
00047     m_pcliConfigMenu(NULL), m_pcliConfigMenuNode(NULL)
00048 {
00049     EnsureCommonDevices();
00050     EnsureTraces();
00051 
00052     // Set the CLI reference to oneself.
00053     SetCli(*this);
00054 
00055     // Register this new CLI in the global CLI list.
00056     M_CLIList.push_back(this);
00057 
00058     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_CLI) << "New CLI '" << GetName() << "'." << cli::endl;
00059 }
00060 
00061 Cli::~Cli(void)
00062 {
00063     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_CLI) << "Deletion of CLI '" << GetName() << "'." << cli::endl;
00064 
00065     // Remove this CLI from the global CLI list.
00066     for (   CliList::iterator it = M_CLIList.begin();
00067             it != M_CLIList.end();
00068             it ++)
00069     {
00070         if (*it == this)
00071         {
00072             it = M_CLIList.erase(it);
00073             break;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     // Destroy menus.
00078     while (! m_vpcliMenus.empty())
00079     {
00080         delete m_vpcliMenus.back();
00081         m_vpcliMenus.pop_back();
00082     }
00083 }
00084 
00085 const int Cli::FindFromName(CliList& CLI_CliList, const std::string& STR_RegExp)
00086 {
00087     // Compile the regular expression.
00088     regex_t s_RegExp;
00089     memset(& s_RegExp, '\0', sizeof(regex_t));
00090     if (regcomp(& s_RegExp, STR_RegExp.c_str(), 0) != 0)
00091     {
00092         return -1;
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Check the name for each CLI instance.
00096     const int i_InitialCount = CLI_CliList.size();
00097     for (   CliList::iterator it = M_CLIList.begin();
00098             it != M_CLIList.end();
00099             it ++)
00100     {
00101         if (regexec(& s_RegExp, (*it)->GetName().c_str(), 0, NULL, 0) == 0)
00102         {
00103             CLI_CliList.push_back(*it);
00104         }
00105     }
00106 
00107     // Free.
00108     regfree(& s_RegExp);
00109 
00110     return (CLI_CliList.size() - i_InitialCount);
00111 }
00112 
00113 const std::string Cli::GetName(void) const
00114 {
00115     return GetKeyword();
00116 }
00117 
00118 Menu& Cli::AddMenu(Menu* const PCLI_Menu)
00119 {
00120     PCLI_Menu->SetCli(*this);
00121     m_vpcliMenus.push_back(PCLI_Menu);
00122     return *PCLI_Menu;
00123 }

00125 void Cli::SetShell(Shell& CLI_Shell) const
00126 {
00127     m_pcliShell = & CLI_Shell;
00128 }
00129 
00130 Shell& Cli::GetShell(void) const
00131 {
00132     if (m_pcliShell != NULL)
00133     {
00134         return *m_pcliShell;
00135     }
00136     else
00137     {
00138         static Shell cli_Shell(*this);
00139         return cli_Shell;
00140     }
00141 }

00174 const Keyword& Cli::GetTracesMenuNode(void) const

00180 
00181 void Cli::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00182 {
00183     Menu::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00184 
00185     m_pcliConfigMenu = dynamic_cast<ConfigMenu*>(& AddMenu(new ConfigMenu()));
00186     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI configuration menu"));
00187         m_pcliConfigMenuNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("cli-config", cli_Help)));
00188         Endl* const pcli_Endl = dynamic_cast<Endl*>(& m_pcliConfigMenuNode->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)));
00189         pcli_Endl->SetMenuRef(new MenuRef(*m_pcliConfigMenu)); }
00190     #ifdef _DEBUG
00191     m_pcliTracesMenu = dynamic_cast<TracesMenu*>(& AddMenu(new TracesMenu()));
00192     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Traces menu"));
00193         m_pcliTracesMenuNode = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("traces", cli_Help)));
00194         Endl* const pcli_Endl = dynamic_cast<Endl*>(& m_pcliTracesMenuNode->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)));
00195         pcli_Endl->SetMenuRef(new MenuRef(*m_pcliTracesMenu)); }
00196     #endif
00197 }
00198 
00199 const bool Cli::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00200 {
00201     if (0) {}
00202     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetConfigMenuNode())
00203     {
00204         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00205         {
00206             // Do nothing but return true so that an execution error is not detected.
00207             return true;
00208         }
00209     }
00210     #ifdef _DEBUG
00211     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetTracesMenuNode())
00212     {
00213         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00214         {
00215             // Do nothing but return true so that an execution error is not detected.
00216             return true;
00217         }
00218     }
00219     #endif
00220 
00221     return Menu::ExecuteReserved(CLI_CommandLine);
00222 }
